cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 115 miles (185 km) SE of Corpus Christi, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the middle Texas coast, then forecast to slow and meander near or just inland of the coast through the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: middle Texas coast (between Corpus Christi and Port O'Connor, TX)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch south of Port Mansfield, TX, to the Mouth of the Rio Grande; Tropical Storm Watch south of the Mouth of the Rio Grande to Boca de Catan, Mexico
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm Surge Warning Port Mansfield to High Island, TX; Hurricane Warning Port Mansfield to Sargent, TX; Tropical Storm Warning north of Sargent to High Island, TX and south of Port Mansfield to the Mouth of the Rio Grande
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coast from the Mouth of the Rio Grande northward to High Island, with potential impacts extending into southwestern Louisiana
